children.desc: Assassination Rogue received massive buffs, both baseline and tier-set, leading to Season 3. Their AoE outputs remain their strongest asset in Mythic+, especially considering the great priority-target damage while doing the AoE. Single-target is the biggest disadvantage, and although it has been recently buffed, it's still a long way from being. The only way to counter it is if you pull mobs on top of the boss for an effective funnel. Overall, we believe they currently have the highest damage output across all DPS specs and are considered one of the strongest contenders for S-tier.
children.descZH: 刺杀盗贼在第三赛季前夕获得了基础属性和套装效果的巨大加强。他们在史诗钥石中的AOE输出依然是最强项，特别是在AOE时还能保持优秀的优先级目标伤害。单体伤害仍是最大短板，尽管最近有所加强，但仍有很大提升空间。唯一弥补方法是把怪物拉到首领身边进行集中输出。总体而言，我们认为他们当前在所有DPS专精中拥有最高伤害输出，是S级的有力竞争者。

children.desc: Arcane Mage has received its fair share of changes leading to the Season 3 of TWW. They will retain its burst-orientated damage profile while simultaneously providing priority-target damage when doing so. Their funnel damage/single target is also considered one of the best, which can gain you a ton of time in Mythic+. Mage utility is also considered one of the best in 5-man orientated content especially when ran with a caster comp. At last, we all know how durable mage, which further solidifies their S-tier spot for now.
children.descZH: 奥术法师在地心之战第三赛季前获得了诸多调整。他们将保持爆发导向的伤害特性，同时在进行AOE时也能提供优先级目标伤害。其集中伤害/单体输出也被认为是最优秀的之一，能在史诗钥石中为你争取大量时间。法师的团队辅助能力在5人内容中首屈一指，特别是在法系队伍中。最后，众所周知法师的生存能力极强，这些都巩固了他们当前的S级地位。

children.desc: Frost Mage received minor changes leading to Season 3, with the most notable being Mastery buffs, [暴风雪] having longer cooldown, making you more focused on core spells like [冰川尖刺], [冰枪术] etc, and a new tier-set. They will retain their great burst damage profile (thanks to [冰冷血脉]), while focusing on priority-target damage. Their single-target is also considered one of the best, which is a major benefit to the spec. In addition, Mage is one of the most durable DPS specializations, and also have one of the best Mythic+ utilities from a DPS point of view.
children.descZH: 冰霜法师在第三赛季前获得了小幅调整，最值得注意的是精通属性加强、[暴风雪]冷却时间延长使玩家更专注于[冰川尖刺]和[冰枪术]等核心技能，以及新套装效果。他们将保持优秀的爆发伤害能力（得益于[冰冷血脉]），同时专注于优先级目标伤害。其单体输出也被认为是最顶尖的，这是该专精的一大优势。此外，法师是最耐打的DPS专精之一，从DPS角度也拥有最好的史诗钥石团队辅助能力。

children.desc: Aside from the impressive Rogue's utility package, Subtlety Rogue has recently seen a substantial buff coming their way, which will significantly improve their performance in all aspects of the game. Their single-target is one of their biggest assets, as the burst capabilities of the spec are not to be underestimated. In addition, their AoE damage is incredible as they are considered one of the strongest in that department. Unfortunately, their sustained AoE, especially if [暗影之舞] is on cooldown can be problematic, but considering everything else, that's a small price to pay!
children.descZH: 除了盗贼职业本身强大的辅助能力外，敏锐贼最近获得了实质性加强，将显著提升其在游戏各方面的表现。其单体输出是最大优势之一，该专精的爆发能力不容小觑。此外，他们的AOE伤害也极为出色，被认为是该领域的佼佼者。美中不足的是持续AOE能力，特别是当[暗影之舞]冷却时会比较棘手，但综合考量下这只是个小代价！

children.desc: Frost Death Knight They will make their long-awaited comeback in Season 3, following a "rework". Most notably, no more annoying [枯萎凋零] casting ever, rework on [冰龙吐息], several new talents introduced, and a lot more consistent damage. Their AoE damage is one of the best, followed by one of the highest single-target & priority-target damage so far across all specializations. In addition, Death Knights are also one of the most durable DPS classes in the game (which is a huge advantage).
children.descZH: 冰霜死亡骑士将在第三赛季迎来期待已久的"重做"回归。最显著的变化包括不再需要施放烦人的[枯萎凋零]、[冰龙吐息]重做、新增数个天赋，以及更稳定的伤害输出。他们的AOE伤害位居顶尖水平，单体与优先级目标伤害也在所有专精中名列前茅。此外，死亡骑士还是游戏中最耐打的DPS职业之一（这是个巨大优势）。

children.desc: Destruction [术士] received its fair share it changes throughout PTR leading towards the last season of this expansion. Destruction [术士] will continue to have one of the best mass AoE damage (especially on higher keys where mobs live longer), good single-target, and most importantly, great sustained damage. One of the weaknesses of this spec is priority target damage while doing AoE but if there are specs that can work in that direction, you will have no issues. At last, every [术士] spec is quite durable and has a great party-wide utility, which fits perfectly for Mythic+.
children.descZH: 毁灭[术士]在这个资料片最终赛季前的PTR阶段获得了诸多调整。毁灭[术士]将继续保持最优秀的大规模AOE伤害（特别是在高层钥石中怪物存活时间更长时）、良好的单体输出，以及最重要的优秀持续伤害。该专精的弱点之一是在AOE时对优先级目标的伤害，但如果有专精能弥补这点，你将毫无问题。最后，所有[术士]专精都相当耐打并拥有强大的团队辅助能力，非常适合史诗钥石。

children.desc: Unholy Death Knight has changed a ton going forward to Season 3, as several new cool talents have surfaced like [憎恶附肢] / [培育憎恶]. The loss of their amazing Season 2 tier-set will be noticeable as an alternative version offered in S3 is not as powerful. Their once "The Best AoE" spec title is long gone (+ [爆裂之疡] is now target-cap), and while it is still amazing, it's nowhere near where it was in Season 2. Death Knight, lost [憎恶附肢] (ability to stack mobs) and still do not have a raid buff. Current Unholy Death Knight is being slightly overshadowed by Frost Death Knight by if chosen, they will still hold their ground.
children.descZH: 邪恶死亡骑士在第三赛季前发生了巨大变化，新增了[憎恶附肢]/[培育憎恶]等酷炫天赋。失去强大的第二赛季套装效果会很明显，因为S3提供的替代版本没那么强力。他们曾经"最佳AOE"专精的头衔早已不复存在（+[爆裂之疡]现在有目标上限），虽然仍然出色，但远不如第二赛季的水平。死亡骑士失去了[憎恶附肢]（聚怪能力）且仍然没有团队增益。当前邪恶死亡骑士略被冰霜死亡骑士的光芒掩盖，但如果选择他们，仍然能坚守阵地。

children.desc: Beast Mastery Hunter is one of the specs that have seen a lot of changes leading up to Season 3. They have an amazing tier-set, which further elevates their already strong sustain-damage. Their single-target & AoE damage output is considered one of the best, especially when put in a physical comp. So far, the specialization looks quite strong, with rarely any disadvantage (except for no party buff - [猎人印记] sucks for M+). Although it has received several nerfs in a row, we believe Beast Mastery Hunter will still perform great after acquiring their BiS stats & gear.
children.descZH: 野兽控制猎人是第三赛季前经历诸多调整的专精之一。他们拥有强大的套装效果，进一步提升了本已优秀的持续伤害能力。其单体与AOE输出被认为是最顶尖的，特别是在物理队伍中。目前看来该专精相当强势，几乎没什么缺点（除了没有团队增益-[猎人印记]在史诗钥石中很鸡肋）。尽管连续遭到几次削弱，我们相信野兽控制猎人在获得毕业装备后仍会有出色表现。

children.desc: Elemental Shaman have received massive single-target buffs leading to the Season 3 of the TWW expansion. Incredible burst, amazing priority-target damage, and one of the best party-wide utilities are some of their strengths. Their sustained damage, outside of major cooldowns, can be lacklustre if you don't proc your [升腾] (or your tier-set), but outside of this, you are incredibly strong.
children.descZH: 元素萨满在地心之战资料片第三赛季前获得了巨大的单体伤害加强。惊人的爆发、优秀的优先级目标伤害，以及最顶尖的团队辅助能力是其优势所在。在大技能冷却期间，如果不触发[升腾]（或套装效果），持续伤害可能会比较平庸，但除此之外你将无比强大。

children.desc: Affliction Warlock has seen some positive changes in the upcoming Season 3. Although they will remain with the same issues as Season 2, relying on [邪恶污染] for mass applying [痛楚], which becomes a significant problem at times, their most recent buffs significantly improve their single-target, priority-target, and funnel damage. Their AoE is already in good hands, which will make them the most powerful they have been in the entire TWW expansion so far. When you run out of minor & major cooldowns, you still have issues doing damage, but outside of this, the power of the spec is enough to push them towards higher tier rankings.
children.descZH: 痛苦术士在即将到来的第三赛季获得了一些积极改动。尽管他们仍将面临与第二赛季相同的问题，即依赖[邪恶污染]来群体施加[痛楚]有时会带来显著困扰，但最近的加强大幅提升了其单体、优先级目标和集中伤害。他们的AOE本已表现良好，这将使他们达到地心之战资料片迄今为止的最强状态。当小技能和大招都处于冷却时，伤害输出仍存在问题，但除此之外，该专精的强度足以推动他们进入更高层级。

children.desc: Feral Druid has received positive changes leading to the Season 3. The specialization will retain its signature burst-orientated profile while being significantly weaker during dry periods. Energy starvation, unfortunately, is still present in the spec, resulting in pockets of time of just "waiting" for more resources rather than actively engaging with your rotation (this is mostly present in single-target). Their utility, just like any Druid spec, will retain its power, as [野性印记] is one of the strongest party-buffs in the group. Overall, we believe Feral Druid to be a great melee option which excels the best in physical orientated comp.
children.descZH: 野性德鲁伊在第三赛季前获得了积极改动。该专精将保持其标志性的爆发导向特性，但在技能真空期会明显疲软。遗憾的是能量短缺问题依然存在，导致有时只能"等待"资源回复而非积极进行输出循环（这主要出现在单体场景）。与其他德鲁伊专精一样，他们的辅助能力依然强大，[野性印记]是最强的团队增益之一。总体而言，我们认为野性德鲁伊是优秀的近战选择，在物理队伍中表现最佳。

children.desc: Shadow Priest received a complete rework in their playstyle and the majority of their talents leading to Season 3. Their damage is looking better as they have amazing priority-target damage while doing AoE. Their single-target is their strongest feature, with several minor cooldowns. In addition, they have finally received [暗影冲撞] quality-of-life update and now have 2x charges. Their utility remains strong, as [能量灌注] and [真言术：韧] are considered great party-buffs to push keys. We believe this spec is significantly better on the higher level keys due to its ramp-up damage profile.
children.descZH: 暗影牧师在第三赛季前获得了玩法风格和大部分天赋的彻底重做。他们的伤害表现更好，因为在进行AOE时拥有惊人的优先级目标伤害。单体输出是最强项，配合多个小技能冷却。此外，他们终于获得了[暗影冲撞]的便利性更新，现在拥有2层充能。辅助能力依然强大，[能量灌注]和[真言术：韧]被认为是冲层的优秀团队增益。我们认为由于伤害需要预热的特点，该专精在高层钥石中表现会明显更好。

children.desc: The performance of Devastation Evoker have received several positive adjustments, most notably flat buffs and a choice to play different builds other than Flameshaper in the upcoming Season 3. The spec has retained its unique Evoker utility, while keeping its damage profile will be "bursty", which will help your performance across different key levels (with a much better-sustained damage profile). The damage output is looking better than ever, which is reflecting their high rankings so far. We are excited to see how they will perform during the season.
children.descZH: 湮灭唤魔师的表现获得了多项积极调整，最显著的是基础属性加强和在第三赛季可以选择除烈焰塑形外的其他流派。该专精保留了独特的唤魔师辅助能力，同时保持"爆发性"的伤害特性，这将帮助你在不同层级的钥石中都有更好表现（配合大幅改善的持续伤害能力）。伤害输出达到前所未有的水平，这也反映了他们当前的高排名。我们期待看到他们在赛季中的表现。

children.desc: Havoc Demon Hunter hasn't currently many changes leading towards Season 3 of TWW, but received one of the most powerful tier-set across all DPS specs (even after the tiny nerfs) thanks to Aldrachi. Their sustained damage (outside of cooldowns) has significantly improved, which was previously one of their weakest points. In addition, their priority-target damage has skyrocketed, making them one of the best in that niche. On top of this, they have good utility, great self-sustain, and one of the most mobile DPS specs out there.
children.descZH: 浩劫恶魔猎手目前对地心之战第三赛季的改动不多，但得益于阿尔德拉奇套装获得了所有DPS专精中最强大的套装效果之一（即使在轻微削弱后）。他们的持续伤害（技能冷却期间）显著提升，这曾是最大短板之一。此外，优先级目标伤害大幅提高，使其成为该领域的佼佼者。最重要的是，他们拥有良好的辅助能力、优秀的自我恢复能力，以及最灵活的DPS专精之一。

children.desc: Enhancement Shaman received minor changes leading to Season 3, but luckily got a powerful tier set. Unfortunately, the raw numbers for Enhancement are not there this time around, especially on single-target damage. Despite that, their AoE damage will still be excellent on top of having one of the best mythic+ utility toolkits in the game and a powerful party-wide buff. Having great sustain damage and insane funnel/priority-target damage are exceptional qualities to have.
children.descZH: 增强萨满在第三赛季前获得了小幅调整，但幸运地得到了强大的套装效果。遗憾的是这次增强的数值并不突出，特别是在单体伤害方面。尽管如此，他们的AOE伤害依然出色，配合游戏中最优秀的史诗钥石辅助工具包之一和强大的团队增益。拥有优秀的持续伤害和惊人的集中/优先级目标伤害是难得的特质。

children.desc: Survival Hunter has received its fair share of changes, leading to the third and final season of Mythic+ in TWW. Their consistent damage is incredible since their major cooldowns are relatively short and their overall output is its best ever been in the whole expansion. Their strength lies in their AoE damage, paired with great priority-target damage. Their single-target is also good, although nowhere near "OP" levels. We believe the spec is already performing much better than the previous season, and we hope they keep that during the season.
children.descZH: 生存猎人在地心之战第三赛季也是最后一个史诗钥石赛季前获得了诸多调整。由于主要技能冷却时间较短，其稳定伤害令人难以置信，整体输出达到资料片迄今为止的最高水平。他们的优势在于AOE伤害配合优秀的优先级目标伤害。单体输出也不错，虽然远未达到"超模"水平。我们认为该专精表现已远超上赛季，希望他们能保持这种状态。

children.desc: Marksmanship Hunter received a ton of changes leading to Season 3 of TWWW. They will retain their burst-oriented profile (thankfully!), which is a prominent feature of MM has been around for a long time now and is incredibly useful against all key levels. Their single-target has improved compared to Season 2 (with Mythic+ builds), which is a welcoming change. Overall, we believe that after the most recent nerfs, they will drop a few tiers down, but still be strong enough to be considered an above-average performer. This spec is one of the best in low-level keys, so if you are a casual player, this is the go-to spec.
children.descZH: 射击猎人在地心之战第三赛季前获得了大量改动。他们将保持爆发导向的特性（谢天谢地！），这是射击猎长久以来的鲜明特点，对所有层级的钥石都极其有用。相比第二赛季（使用史诗钥石天赋），单体伤害有所提升，这是个可喜的变化。总体而言，我们认为在最近的削弱后，他们会下降几个层级，但仍足够强势被视为高于平均水平的专精。该专精在低层钥石中表现最佳，所以如果你是休闲玩家，这是首选专精。

children.desc: Retribution Paladin has received its fair share of changes leading to the next season, most notably with The nerf to [神圣之锤], making it a 2-minute cooldown and reducing the of duration you ramp up. This significantly cripples their overall damage output but with the most recent compensation buffs, they will retain their great AoE damage. Their single-target has recently been buffed, which is one of their weakest points so far, but still far from the top-performing specs. Keep in mind that they also possess excellent defensive options in case of danger, and are considered to have one of the strongest utility toolkits among all DPS specs.
children.descZH: 惩戒圣骑士在下个赛季前获得了诸多调整，最显著的是[神圣之锤]被削弱为2分钟冷却并缩短了持续时间。这严重影响了整体伤害输出，但凭借最近的补偿性加强，他们仍将保持优秀的AOE伤害。单体伤害最近获得加强，虽然这是目前最弱项之一，但距离顶尖专精仍有差距。请注意他们还拥有出色的防御手段应对危险，并被认为是所有DPS专精中辅助能力最强的之一。

children.desc: Demonology Warlock received one of the most powerful tier sets across all DPS specs, in addition to some baseline buffs to their already strong overall damage output. They will have better-sustained damage when running outside of cooldowns while having incredibly strong single-target output. In terms of utility, they will keep their unique Mythic+ package while being one of the most "tanky" Ranged DPS. After the most recent nerfs to the spec, their positioning will drop down a few spots, but still will be considered a good choice in Season 3, especially in single-target orientated dungeons.
children.descZH: 恶魔学识术士获得了所有DPS专精中最强大的套装效果之一，此外本已强劲的整体伤害输出还获得了基础属性加强。他们在技能冷却期间将有更好的持续伤害，同时保持极强的单体输出。辅助能力方面，他们将保留独特的史诗钥石工具包，同时是最"硬"的远程DPS之一。在最近对该专精的削弱后，排名会下降几位，但在第三赛季仍是不错的选择，特别是在偏重单体输出的地下城中。

children.desc: Outlaw Rogue did receive some general buffs and a [影舞步] rework which is likely the biggest quality of life they have seen in years. The spec will retain its great consistent AoE damage, but unfortunately, will still be target-capped. Their single-target has recently being buffed which helps a ton as previously that was their major concern. Their defensive profile will remain unchanged and so will their amazing group-wide utility and mob control.
children.descZH: 狂徒盗贼确实获得了一些全面加强和[影舞步]重做，这可能是多年来最大的便利性改进。该专精将保持优秀的稳定AOE伤害，但遗憾的是仍有目标数量限制。单体伤害最近获得加强，这帮助很大因为此前这是主要短板。防御特性保持不变，惊人的团队辅助和怪物控制能力也是如此。

children.desc: Fire Mage is entering Season 3 in shambles, as several consecutive nerfs done to them in the weeks leading to the season left them down in the drain. Their single-target (previously incredible) is now one of the lowest in Mythic+. To add on top of that, their AoE damage is one of the lowest across all Ranged DPS specs. Their damage output will be better for the highest levels of keys due to the higher mob HP, and it might lose some value for your casual level keys. Overall, we are expecting buffs to the spec; otherwise, they will be in trouble.Just like every Mage spec so far, they have one of the best group-wide Mythic+ utilities.
children.descZH: 火焰法师以惨淡状态进入第三赛季，赛季前连续数周的削弱使他们跌入谷底。其单体伤害（曾经非常出色）现在是史诗钥石中最低的之一。更糟的是，AOE伤害在所有远程DPS专精中也垫底。由于高层钥石怪物血量更高，伤害输出会相对好一些，但在休闲层级可能价值不高。总体而言，我们期待对该专精的加强，否则他们将陷入困境。与所有法师专精一样，他们拥有最优秀的史诗钥石团队辅助能力之一。

children.desc: Balance Druid did get minor changes leading to Season 3. Unfortunately after the most recent tier-set nerfs, Balance unique funnel damage (when played with KotG Hero Talents) is now gone. This has been a major nerf to their overall damage contribution, which will result in a downfall from the previous S-tier spot. Their current AoE damage is still great, but the single-target needs to be further adjusted. The utility of Druid is heavily desired in a 5-man group due to its offensive and defensive powers. Overall, I'd expect to see compensation buffs to Balance Druids anywhere during the season.
children.descZH: 平衡德鲁伊在第三赛季前确实获得了一些小调整。不幸的是，在最近的套装效果削弱后，平衡德独特的集中伤害（配合科特格英雄天赋时）现已消失。这对他们的整体伤害贡献是重大削弱，将导致从原先的S级位置跌落。当前的AOE伤害仍然出色，但单体伤害还需进一步调整。由于兼具进攻和防御能力，德鲁伊的辅助功能在5人小队中备受青睐。总体而言，我预计平衡德会在赛季中获得补偿性加强。

children.desc: Arms Warrior received healthy buffs leading to Season 3 of TWW. Although the spec didn't start great, they have been given 3 consecutive buffs in a row, significantly improving their overall damage. This will put their AoE damage and single-target, in a much better state. This further solidifies their core position in the physical-comp meta, due to [战斗怒吼] value, and perhaps a situational pick, swapping back and forth with your siblings' spec. Overall, if physical-comp remains as strong as it is right now, they are in a good spot!
children.descZH: 武器战士在地心之战第三赛季前获得了可观的加强。虽然这个专精起步不佳，但连续三次加强显著提升了整体伤害。这将使他们的AOE和单体伤害达到更理想的状态。由于[战斗怒吼]的价值，这进一步巩固了他们在物理队伍中的核心地位，或许还能根据情况与兄弟专精切换使用。总体而言，如果物理队保持当前强度，他们的处境会很好！

children.desc: Fury Warrior hasn't seen any changes leading towards Season 3. They still are one of the few DPS specs that are a 5-target hard-capped, which reduces their AoE output. However, this spec has been getting buffs for the past 3 weeks and is now in a much better shape compared to where it started. Both single-target and AoE are looking better, and although your raw output might not match the specs & classes on the S-tier, your overall value in a physical-comp (thanks to [战斗怒吼]), will guarantee your invites./p>
children.descZH: 狂怒战士在第三赛季前没有任何改动。他们仍是少数受5目标硬上限限制的DPS专精之一，这降低了AOE输出。不过该专精过去三周持续获得加强，相比最初状态已改善许多。单体和AOE表现都有提升，虽然原始输出可能不及S级专精，但在物理队伍中的整体价值（得益于[战斗怒吼]）将确保你获得组队邀请。

children.desc: Windwalker Monk hasn't seen any significant changes leading to Season 3 of TWW. Their toolkit, playstyle, and utility will mostly remain the same as nothing of significance has been added. Unfortunately, Windwalker Monk is one of the few specs that yet remains to have its target cap present, which can result in problems in mass AoE, but when that is not present, they will do great. The burst single-target capabilities are also an advantage, although the most recent nerfs will hit both their ST and AoE. At last, the value of the spec significantly increases when its paired with a physical comp since [玄秘掌] is a must to have, so even if your output is not the best, you will still be chosen over!
children.descZH: 踏风武僧在地心之战第三赛季前没有重大改动。他们的技能组合、玩法和辅助功能基本保持不变，没有新增重要内容。遗憾的是，踏风仍是少数保留目标数量上限的专精之一，这在大规模AOE时会造成问题，但在其他场合表现优异。爆发单体能力也是个优势，不过最近的削弱同时影响了单体和AOE。最后，由于[玄秘掌]是物理队必备，该专精在物理队伍中的价值会大幅提升，所以即使输出不是最佳，你依然会被优先选中！

children.desc: Augmentation Evoker has received no relevant changes (except flat % damage buffs) leading to Season 3, which results in no change to the rotation. They will retain their great utility, good mob control, and the ability to bolster your team's defensive and offensive profiles (especially as a DPS player) While there is still immense defensive value in taking Augmentation Evoker to your team, it will results in slower times throughout the dungeon as majority of the time, a regular 3rd DPS will just have more raw output.
children.descZH: 增辉唤魔师在第三赛季前没有实质性改动（除了基础伤害百分比提升），因此输出循环保持不变。他们将保留强大的辅助能力、优秀的怪物控制，以及增强团队攻防属性的能力（特别是作为DPS时）。虽然增辉唤魔师能为团队带来巨大防御价值，但会导致副本通关速度变慢，因为多数情况下第三个常规DPS位能提供更直接的伤害输出。
